other_tests.findings: Identified three ClC-Kb allelic variants in both patients.
Two new mutations (L27R and W610X) and a G to C substitution found in ClC-Kb gene.

other_tests.date: Patient 1: At 7 years; Patient 2: At 3 years 6 months
other_tests.findings: Patient 1: Serum sodium 130, chloride 81, potassium 2.1 mmol/L; Patient 2: Serum sodium 123, chloride 68, potassium 1.8 mmol/L.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient 2 showed catch-up growth, but urine calcium excretion remained low.

other_tests.findings: Not specified, but diagnosis relates to renal electrolyte transporter dysfunction.
